original_text: scooby dooby doo / and shaggy too / you both look and sound great . / but daphne , you're too buff / fred thinks he's tough / and velma - wow , you've lost weight !
generated_text:
1. "The Avengers, assemble! / But Iron Man, your ego's too big / Captain America, you're too old / Black Widow, your skills are too old / Thor, your hammer's too small"
2. "The cast of Friends, what a blast! / But Joey, your acting's too bad / Monica, your cleaning's too much / Rachel, your hair's too blonde / Ross, your jokes are too lame"
3. "The crew of Star Wars, what a team! / But Luke, your lightsaber's too weak / Han, your flying's too rough / Leia, your hair's too short / Chewbacca, your growling's too loud"
4. "The characters of The Hunger Games, what a fight! / But Katniss, your archery's too poor / Peeta, your baking's too sweet / Gale, your hunting's too mean / Haymitch, your drinking's too much"
